abstract: Angelos Charisteas (Greek: Άγγελος Χαριστέας, pronounced [ˈaɲɟelos xariˈste.as]; born 9 February 1980) is a Greek footballer who plays for Australian NSW Premier League side Sydney Olympic FC.Charisteas had a crucial role in the UEFA Euro 2004, won by Greece, scoring three vital goals, including the one in the final against Portugal.
comment: Angelos Charisteas (Greek: Άγγελος Χαριστέας, pronounced [ˈaɲɟelos xariˈste.as]; born 9 February 1980) is a Greek footballer who plays for Australian NSW Premier League side Sydney Olympic FC.Charisteas had a crucial role in the UEFA Euro 2004, won by Greece, scoring three vital goals, including the one in the final against Portugal.
